abstract: Brazil's security coordinator for major events says foreign security agencies are working closely with Brazil ahead of 2016 Olympic games, after concerns arose in wake of Paris terror attacks; other Olympic news noted.
lead_paragraph: Foreign security agencies, including those in the United States and France, are working closely with Brazil ahead of next year’s Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro.
snippet: Foreign security agencies, including those in the United States and France, are working closely with Brazil ahead of next year’s Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro.
